Crate re_viewer::external::re_query

source ·
Expand description

Provide query-centric access to the re_data_store.

Structs

  • ArchetypeView
    A view of an Archetype at a particular point in time returned by crate::get_component_with_instances.
  • ComponentNotFoundError
  • ComponentWithInstances
    A type-erased array of Component values and the corresponding InstanceKey keys.
  • ExtraQueryHistory
    When showing an entity in the history view, add this much history to it.
  • VisibleHistory
    Visible history bounds.

Enums

  • QueryError
  • VisibleHistoryBoundary
    One of the boundaries of the visible history.

Functions

  • __populate_example_store
    Helper used to create an example store we can use for querying in doctests
  • get_component_with_instances
    Retrieves a ComponentWithInstances from the DataStore.
  • query_archetype
    Retrieve an ArchetypeView from the DataStore, as well as the associated data time of its most recent component.
  • query_archetype_with_history
  • range_archetype
    Iterates over the rows of any number of components and their respective cluster keys, all from the point-of-view of the required components, returning an iterator of ArchetypeViews.
  • range_component_set
    Iterates over the rows of any number of components and their respective cluster keys, all from the point-of-view of the povs components, returning an iterator of ArchetypeViews.
